articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Ink attack on Rakesh Tikait: RLD urges Karnataka government for quick action against culprits
articles.description: "The misbehaviour with BKU national spokesperson Rakesh Tikait in Bengaluru is shameful. The Karnataka government should ensure strict action against the culprits immediately," RLD chief Jayant Chaudhary said in a statement.

articles.title: Russia floats new foreign debt payment system
articles.description: Russia previously has offered natural gas customers to establish an account in dollars or euros at Gazprombank, then a second account in rubles. The importer would pay the gas bill in euros or dollars and direct the bank to exchange the money for rubles.
